scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:app && npm run build:storybook
scripts.clean:app: node npm-scripts/remove.js -s public/example -d public -i index.html && rm -rf public/example
scripts.build:app: npm run clean:app && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack && npm run postbuild:app
scripts.postbuild:app: node npm-scripts/copy.js -s .example -d public/example && node npm-scripts/copy.js -s public/example -i index.html
scripts.clean:storybook: node npm-scripts/remove.js -s public/storybook -d public -i index.html && rm -rf public/storybook
scripts.build:storybook: npm run clean:storybook && build-storybook -c .storybook -o public/storybook && npm run postbuild:storybook
